about_the_game:
What turns a person into a drug dealer? And a drug dealer into a casino top dog? Take a crack at the high-stakes gambling world with the Drug Dealer Simulator 2: Casino DLC!

If the drug dealing underworld is not enough to satisfy your craving for money and power, now you have a chance to reach beyond! Are you ready to take your chances in a casino? And later - to take over its operation?



Casino DLC introduces a brand new location and quests to Drug Dealer Simulator 2. Gain access to a VIP casino hidden away on a remote drilling rig located some distance away from the shores of Isla Sombra. Try your luck in five different gambling games:

  • Texas Hold'em Multiplayer
  • All-in Poker
  • Slot machines
  • Blackjack
  • Roulette

Caught your interest? How about owning the place and turning it into your personal piggy bank? Take on a quest that will turn you into a big-shot casino owner!

DLC FEATURES

  • New location – drilling rig casino;
  • 5 available gambling games, including co-op poker;
  • 2 new quests which allow you to take over the casino.

Ready? Good luck!

content_descriptors.notes: Drug Dealer Simulator 2: Casino DLC contains mentions and imagery of gambling and drug trafficking, as well as slight swearing and crude language.

name: Drug Dealer Simulator 2: Casino DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommented

short_description: Take a crack at the high-stakes gambling world! Gain access to a VIP casino hidden away on a remote oil rig. Try your luck in 5 gambling games, including co-op poker. Take on a quest that will turn you into a big-shot casino owner!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
